sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
        <v-main v-if="logged">
            <MainView/>
        </v-main>
        <v-main v-else>
            <LogIn/>
        </v-main>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import MainView from './components/Main.vue'
import LogIn from './components/AuthCompo/LogIn.vue'
// import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: 'App',

    data: () => ({
        logged : false
    }),
    created : function(){
        // 로컬스토리지에 jwt 이 존재하는지에 따라 로그인 여부 판단하기
        const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token')
        if(token){
            this.logged = true
        }
    },


    components: {
        MainView,
        LogIn,
    },


}
</script>
